output:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, amen.
They talk about the wolf in the sea around them,
They say it's a dirty trick and that every day,
Their lives are being eaten,
But they could stop complaining,
If they had what they should fear,
What could happen to them.
Because in Mörtemusel,
The poor people went crazy,
They discovered a new predator,
They say the wolf is a traitor.
In the mountains of the Pyrenees,
The problem of the Slovene wolf,
Is that they want to exterminate everything,
Their father is a trabena,
When they cross the paths,
They cross the beast,
They cross the green Alet,
To sutomize the dogs.
That's how the animal,
To the smell of each one,
Will assure its descendants,
In the mountains of France.
Voilà!
Voilà!
